languages.text: "Именно для этого мы здесь, Изгой. Протяни руку, ухватись за копье возмездия вместе с нами — и вонзи его в черное сердце властелина боли".

traits.locale_text: "Именно для этого мы здесь, Изгой. Протяни руку, ухватись за копье возмездия вместе с нами — и вонзи его в черное сердце властелина боли".
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "This is what we are here for, Outcast. Stretch out your hand, grasp the spear of vengeance together with us — and plunge it into the dark heart of the architect of torment."
languages.original_text: "Именно для этого мы здесь, Изгой. Протяни руку, ухватись за копье возмездия вместе с нами — и вонзи его в черное сердце властелина боли".

traits.locale_text: "This is what we are here for, Exile. Stretch out your hand, grasp the spear of vengeance together with us — and plunge it into the dark heart of the architect of torment."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "This is what we are here for, Outcast. Stretch out your hand, grasp the spear of vengeance together with us — and plunge it into the dark heart of the architect of torment."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: «Esto es para lo que hemos venido, proscrita. Extiende la mano, blande la lanza de la venganza a nuestro lado y húndela en el negro corazón del causante de nuestro tormento».
languages.original_text: "This is what we are here for, Outcast. Stretch out your hand, grasp the spear of vengeance together with us — and plunge it into the dark heart of the architect of torment."

traits.locale_text: «Esto es para lo que hemos venido, proscrita. Extiende la mano, blande la lanza de la venganza a nuestro lado y húndela en el negro corazón del causante de nuestro tormento».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: “我们来这里就是为了这个目的，流浪者。伸出你的手，与我们一起握紧复仇之矛，用它刺穿痛苦缔造者的黑心吧。”
languages.original_text: "This is what we are here for, Outcast. Stretch out your hand, grasp the spear of vengeance together with us — and plunge it into the dark heart of the architect of torment."

traits.locale_text: “我们来这里就是为了这个目的，流浪者。伸出你的手，与我们一起握紧复仇之矛，用它刺穿痛苦缔造者的黑心吧。”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: « C'est la raison de notre présence ici, Errante. Tendez la main, saisissez la lance de la vengeance avec nous et plongez-la dans le cœur noir de l'architecte du tourment. »
languages.original_text: "This is what we are here for, Outcast. Stretch out your hand, grasp the spear of vengeance together with us — and plunge it into the dark heart of the architect of torment."

traits.locale_text: « C'est la raison de notre présence ici, Errante. Tendez la main, saisissez la lance de la vengeance avec nous et plongez-la dans le cœur noir de l'architecte du tourment. »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: 「そのために我々はここにいるのだ、追放者。手を伸ばし、我々と一緒に復讐の槍を握れ…そして、苦しみを生み出す者の暗き心臓にそれを突き刺せ」
languages.original_text: "This is what we are here for, Outcast. Stretch out your hand, grasp the spear of vengeance together with us — and plunge it into the dark heart of the architect of torment."

traits.locale_text: 「そのために我々はここにいるのだ、追放者。手を伸ばし、我々と一緒に復讐の槍を握れ…そして、苦しみを生み出す者の暗き心臓にそれを突き刺せ」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Daher sind wir hier, Ausgestoßene. Streckt die Hand aus, ergreift gemeinsam mit uns den Speer der Rache — und rammt ihn ins dunkle Herz des Architekten der Pein."
languages.original_text: "This is what we are here for, Outcast. Stretch out your hand, grasp the spear of vengeance together with us — and plunge it into the dark heart of the architect of torment."

traits.locale_text: "Daher sind wir hier, Ausgestoßene. Streckt die Hand aus, ergreift gemeinsam mit uns den Speer der Rache — und rammt ihn ins dunkle Herz des Architekten der Pein."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Buraya bunun için geldik Yurtsuz. Elini uzat, intikam mızrağını bizimle birlikte taşı ve onu işkencenin mimarının o karanlık kalbine sapla."
languages.original_text: "This is what we are here for, Outcast. Stretch out your hand, grasp the spear of vengeance together with us — and plunge it into the dark heart of the architect of torment."

traits.locale_text: "Buraya bunun için geldik Yurtsuz. Elini uzat, intikam mızrağını bizimle birlikte taşı ve onu işkencenin mimarının o karanlık kalbine sapla."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader
